recipe.title: Spiced Yogurt Drink
ingredients: Garnish: freshly grated nutmeg; ground cardamom
instructions: Remove seeds from cardamom pods (discard pods) and transfer to a blender. Add yogurt, sugar, nutmeg, and water and blend until smooth. If drink is too thick, thin with water, 1 tablespoon at a time. Serve over ice in tall glasses.
